title: Which Astrology Sign Are You Most Compatible With? The Ultimate Guide to Zodiac Compatibility

steps.title: Gemini
steps.content: Gemini , Leo , Libra , and Sagittarius: As a dynamic Aries, you love to take charge and pave the way for life’s latest and greatest adventures. [1] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. The independent Gemini will gladly support your free spirit, while the confident, self-assured Leo can keep you on your toes. The calm, peaceful Libra offers a nice contrast to your bold, fiery energy, and the eager Sagittarius will be happy to explore new heights with you. Honorable Mentions: Aquarius Incompatible: Cancer, Virgo, and Scorpio

steps.title: Cancer
steps.content: Cancer , Virgo, and Capricorn : The grounded Taurus values stability and security above all else, and isn’t looking for someone to rock the boat. Enter Cancer—a sensitive, nurturing sign who is more than happy to provide that stability for you. Don’t rule out your fellow Earth signs, either! A Virgo’s logical view of the world can help keep you grounded, while a Capricorn’s steady presence can be a valuable source of support. [2] X Research source Honorable Mentions: Scorpio and Pisces Incompatible: Leo, Sagittarius, and Aquarius

steps.title: Libra, Sagittarius, and Aquarius:
steps.content: Libra, Sagittarius, and Aquarius : As an extroverted Gemini, you’re on the lookout for an intriguing partner who can keep you guessing. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. The thoughtful Sagittarius makes for great company, along with the out-of-the-box Aquarius. An engaging, intelligent Libra could also make for a great long-term partner. Honorable Mentions: Aries and Leo Incompatible: Taurus, Scorpio, and Capricorn

steps.title: Taurus
steps.content: Taurus , Virgo, Scorpio , and Pisces: Emotional and sensitive, Cancers need a loving, supportive partner to provide them with lots of love and security. A steady, grounded Taurus is the perfect person to do this, along with the consistent Virgo. The passionate Scorpio and caring Pisces are also great potential matches. Incompatible: Gemini, Leo, and Sagittarius

steps.title: Sagittarius and Libra:
steps.content: Sagittarius and Libra: As a friendly, self-assured Leo, you need a partner who can keep up with your bold, generous energy. [4] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. A radiant, charming Sagittarius could complement your personality super well, while a steady, harmonious Libra can help keep your relationship nice and balanced. Honorable Mentions: Aries, Gemini, Scorpio, and Aquarius Incompatible: Capricorn, Taurus, and Virgo

steps.title: Taurus, Scorpio, and Capricorn:
steps.content: Taurus, Scorpio, and Capricorn: Detail-oriented Virgos really like honesty, availability, and cleanliness. [5] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Thankfully, the steady, grounded Taurus is definitely up to the task! You’re also in good hands with the intense but caring Scorpio, along with rational, devoted Capricorn. Honorable Mention: Pisces Incompatible: Gemini, Sagittarius, and Aquarius

steps.title: Aries
steps.content: Aries , Gemini, Sagittarius, and Aquarius: Libras love seeking balance and harmony, and mesh well with signs who approach life in an energetic way. [6] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. The fiery Aries is a great potential match, as well as the open-minded, intellectual Aquarius. The clever Gemini can always keep a Libra’s mind busy, while the focused, determined Sagittarius holds Libra-like priorities in life. Honorable Mention: Leo Incompatible: Virgo, Capricorn, and Pisces

steps.title: Cancer, Capricorn, and Pisces:
steps.content: Cancer, Capricorn, and Pisces : The passionate Scorpio gets along really well with their fellow water signs. The nurturing, nostalgic Cancer offers a nice balance to Scorpio’s intensity, while the thoughtful, empathetic Pisces knows how to meet a Scorpio’s needs. The loyal, committed Capricorn is another great possible match. Honorable Mention: Taurus Incompatible: Aries, Leo, and Aquarius

steps.title: Aries, Gemini, and Aquarius:
steps.content: Aries, Gemini, and Aquarius: The carefree Sagittarius is always looking to expand their horizons, and is searching for someone who’s willing to journey with them. The bold, trail-blazing Aries makes for a great companion, along with the free-spirited and fun Gemini. Don’t forget about Aquarius, who can add a fun spirit of competition to your relationship. Honorable Mentions: Leo, Libra, and Sagittarius Incompatible: Taurus, Capricorn, and Pisces

steps.title: Taurus, Virgo, and Scorpio:
steps.content: Taurus, Virgo , and Scorpio: Capricorns shoot for the stars, and are looking for a partner who’s willing to soar to new heights with them. [7] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Perfectionist Virgo completely meets this criteria, as does the steady, undeterred Taurus. The determined Scorpio can also keep up with whatever pace you set. Honorable Mentions: Capricorn and Pisces Incompatible: Gemini, Leo, and Sagittarius

steps.title: Aries, Gemini, Libra, and Aquarius:
steps.content: Aries, Gemini, Libra, and Aquarius: As an Aquarius, you couldn’t care less about mainstream trends or fads, and you want a partner who can really embrace your interests and perspective on life. [8] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. The independent Aries could be a great companion, along with the free-spirited Gemini. Don’t rule out the intelligent Libra, or even another Aquarius to keep your brain (and heart!) occupied. Honorable Mentions: Leo and Sagittarius Incompatible: Taurus, Cancer, and Scorpio

steps.title: Cancer, Scorpio, and Capricorn:
steps.content: Cancer, Scorpio, and Capricorn: As a Pisces, you wear your heart on your sleeve; chances are, you want a lover who isn’t afraid to do the same. A Cancer can match (if not surpass) your deep sense of emotion, along with the zealously caring Scorpio. A Capricorn may not be as emotionally intense as your fellow water signs, but they offer valuable support and devotion. Honorable Mentions: Taurus, Virgo, and Pisces Incompatible: Gemini, Leo, and Sagittarius
